member.summary: Use this only if you don't want the vehicle details to appear after typing in a licence plate in a custom window. Remember to reactivate this after you're done fetching the input.

member.name: M:Traffic_Policer.API.Functions.SetTicketReasonsEnabled(System.Boolean)
member.summary: Use this only if you don't want the ticket reasons to display while writing a ticket for your plugin. Remember to reactivate this after you're done. ///

member.name: M:Traffic_Policer.API.Functions.SetPedAlcoholLevel(Rage.Ped,Traffic_Policer.Impairment_Tests.AlcoholLevels)
member.summary: Sets the alcohol level for the ped. Used by Traffic Policer's Breathalyzer. Automatically converts the AlcoholLevel to an appropriate reading depending on the player's personal alcohol limit.

member.name: M:Traffic_Policer.API.Functions.SetPedAlcoholLevel(Rage.Ped,System.Boolean)
member.summary: Sets whether the ped is over the alcohol limit or not.
member.param: If true, sets ped as over the limit. If false, sets ped as under the limit.

member.name: M:Traffic_Policer.API.Functions.GetRandomOverTheLimitAlcoholLevel
member.summary: Returns a random alcohol level that's over the limit. Higher alcohol limits have a lower chance of being returned.

member.name: M:Traffic_Policer.API.Functions.GetRandomUnderTheLimitAlcoholLevel
member.summary: Returns a random alcohol level that's under the limit. Higher alcohol limits have a lower chance of being returned.

member.name: M:Traffic_Policer.API.Functions.IsPedOverTheAlcoholLimit(Rage.Ped)
member.summary: Returns true if ped is over the alcohol limit.
